CustomField.formula: IF ((Customer_Type_f__c = 'Existing' || ISPICKVAL(Account_Type__c, 'Domestic Strategic Account') || ISPICKVAL(Account_Type__c, 'Global Strategic Account') || Count_of_Active_Opps__c > 0 || Competitor__c = TRUE || Supplier__c = TRUE || Partner__c = TRUE || Do_Not_Contact__c = TRUE ) ,true, false )
CustomField.label: Open Doors DNC
